thread.title: Comcast CEO’s Bid to Take Over Sky Scrambles Deals for Fox and Disney

author: Stu Woo
title: Comcast CEO’s Bid to Take Over Sky Scrambles Deals for Fox and Disney
text:
Comcast Corp. is pursuing an audacious takeover of European pay TV giant Sky PLC, a power move in a global media-industry chess match.
In a single gambit, Comcast Chief Executive Brian Roberts has scrambled the game board in multiple ways. Comcast said Tuesday it was planning a £22.1 billion ($30.9 billion) offer for all of Sky, topping a rival bid from 21st Century Fox Inc. to consolidate ownership of the U.K. broadcaster. Fox already owns 39% of Sky.
...
